Update on Dynasonics TFX Ultra Platform | July 18, 2014
Confidential & Proprietary
Dear Dynasonics Representative:
Previously, we communicated a temporary hold for all TFX Ultra meters with hazardous certification. We have received approval to resume shipments of meters with the U.S. and Canada hazardous certification.
Power Option Approvals Advanced Comm. Options Shipping Status C (24V AC) N (General Safety) Any Shipping A (AC Line Power) N (General Safety) Any Shipping D (DC Powered) N (General Safety) Any Shipping A (AC Line Power) F (Hazardous Area) U.S. and Canada certifications Any Now Shipping D (DC Powered) F (Hazardous Area) U.S. and Canada certifications Any Now Shipping
We appreciate your business and regret the interruptions that this product hold has caused. If you have additional questions, please let us know and we will provide as much information as possible.
Regards,
Cheryl Ades Anspach
Marketing Manager
As always, we welcome your input. Please contact us with any comments or suggestions you may have. Marketing eNews Feedback
